scripts.jsdoc:public: rimraf doc/public/ && jsdoc src/audiochart.js --readme README.md --destination doc/public/
scripts.jsdoc:internal: rimraf doc/internal/ && jsdoc src/audiochart.js --readme README.md --private --destination doc/internal/
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run uglify && npm run jsdoc:public && npm run jsdoc:internal && npm run docco
